item.title: Meagan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Meagan add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Meagan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I have heard there are troubles of more than one kind. Some come from ahead and some come from behind. But I've bought a big bat. I'm all ready you see. Now my troubles are going to have troubles with me!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Meagan add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "Kisses are a better fate than wisdom." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Meagan add a quote by Annette Curtis Klause
item.description: "I'd like to give you my heart, but since that might be inconvenient, I've brought you someone else's." -- Annette Curtis Klause

item.title: Meagan add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "The greatest of all mistakes is to do nothing because you think you can only do a little." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Meagan add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Woo woo, secret vampire stuff!" -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Meagan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Meagan add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Hereâ€™s to books, the cheapest vacation you can buy." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Meagan add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Meagan add a quote by Scott Westerfeld
item.description: "You see, freedom has a way of destroying things." -- Scott Westerfeld

item.title: Meagan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Meagan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, Nothing is going to get better. It's not." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Meagan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "If things start happening, don't worry, don't stew, just go right along and you'll start happening too." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Meagan add a quote by James Reese
item.description: "Craftwork--it is neither as easy as faith, nor as sure as science." -- James Reese

item.title: Meagan add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description: "Once you start thinking about the lies people tell when they don't know they're telling them, the truths people reveal when they think they're lying, then you can start to build a world." -- Sarah Rees Brennan
